definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: China's feudal legal system came into its both perfection and decline in the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中國封建法政體制至清代臻於完善並開始解體。

sentences.english: The next conference of the NEAT will be held in Thailandand sponsored by the ThammasatUniversity.
sentences.chinese: 下一次年會在泰國召開，由法政大學主辦。

sentences.english: That's the point at the heart of Locke's whole account of legitimate government.
sentences.chinese: 這就是洛克對於合法政府觀點的核心部分。

sentences.english: The Thammasat University Massacre took place on October 6, 1976.
sentences.chinese: 泰國法政大學屠殺發生在1976年10月6日。

sentences.english: China's feudal legal system arrives at perfection in the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 中國封建法政體制至明代臻於完善。

sentences.english: This is the Faculty of Commerce and Accountancy building.
sentences.chinese: 這是法政大學的商業與會計學系大樓。

sentences.english: Democratic elections are widely recognized as a foundation of legitimate government.
sentences.chinese: 民主選舉被普遍視爲合法政府的根基。

definition: to track down/to investigate and arrest

to patrol/policeman (in China's former foreign concessions)
criminal police/member of the criminal police
